desc: Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Florida-based provider of fast business loans offering working capital solutions for small businesses with quick approval and same-day funding.

New York-based alternative funding company specializing in merchant cash advances and business financing. Reports $50M+ in funding secured with 1,000+ successful business transformations and offers MCA, business lines of credit, term loans, and mortgage solutions.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific products and services.

California-based fintech platform specializing in invoice and PO financing, asset-based lending, and term loans for B2B small businesses. Evaluates creditworthiness of customers rather than the borrowing business, with rates as low as 1.2%.

Nevada-based company providing payroll funding and financing solutions for small businesses and staffing agencies, helping bridge cash flow gaps between invoice submission and customer payment through invoice factoring.

California-based provider of unsecured working capital solutions for small to mid-sized businesses. Founded in 2020 by experienced MCA professionals, offers same-day funding decisions and serves businesses nationwide across all industries.

Multi-national asset finance platform (formerly Marlin Leasing) operating across Europe, UK, and US, offering equipment lease and loan products to manufacturers, distributors, dealers and customers. Over $5.1B in balance sheet lease assets and $2.72B in annual originations across 13 countries. Owned by HPS Investment Partners.
Texas-based company. Limited public information available about their role in small business lending.
Florida-based merchant cash advance provider offering business cash advances that convert future Visa and MasterCard receivables into immediate capital for small business owners.

Pennsylvania-based pre-settlement legal funding company providing non-recourse cash advances ($500 to $100K+) to plaintiffs with pending litigation claims and attorney funding ($500 to $1M+) within 24 hours of approval. Not a traditional small business lender.

California-based international peer-to-peer microlending platform connecting individual lenders with entrepreneurs in underserved countries (primarily Kenya and South Africa). Not a traditional MCA or small business lender in the US market.

Brooklyn, NY-based direct MCA lender providing quick working capital ($5K-$250K) for small and medium businesses with approval within 4 hours and same-day funding. BBB A-rated, offers ISO partnership programs for brokers.

Florida-based (Fort Myers/SWFL) lending brokerage operating as 239Loans.com, providing access to revenue-based funding, business loans, lines of credit, and equipment financing up to $3MM. Founded in 2020, serves businesses locally in Southwest Florida and nationwide.
New Jersey-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.

New York-based merchant cash advance provider founded in 2009, offering advances from $4,000 to $150,000 to small businesses. Serves businesses with credit scores below 600 (30% below 500) with funding within six business days.
California-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific products and services.

South Africa-based fintech providing innovative funding solutions for SMEs through a profit-sharing model rather than traditional lending. Named one of Top 20 Most Innovative Companies in Africa by Fast Company in 2020. Charges deal management fees instead of interest.
Florida-based small business lending or fintech company. Limited public information available.

Reno, Nevada-based business lending broker founded in 2015, connecting small business owners with funding products including short/long term loans, SBA loans, working capital, invoice factoring, equipment financing, and lines of credit.

New York-based (Westbury, NY) financial services company founded in 2016 offering small business loans, working capital, equipment financing, and merchant cash advances up to $1.5M. Claims 20,000+ businesses helped worldwide with 95% approval rate and 48-hour funding.

Texas-based (near Austin) invoice factoring, asset-based lending, and cash flow lending company serving small businesses across the US and Canada. Closed a $30M senior lending facility with Texas Capital in 2024 with accordion to $40M. Facilities up to $20M per client.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.

Award-winning embedded equipment finance platform leveraging AI for B2B equipment financing. Created by Innovation Finance USA LLC (founded 2018) by former First American executives. Enables instant equipment financing ($5K-$5M) at point of sale, partnering with banks and OEMs. Won 'Best Overall LendTech Company' at 2025 FinTech Breakthrough Awards.
California-based small business funding company offering merchant cash advance and working capital solutions. Limited detailed public information available.

New York-based merchant cash advance company founded in 2007, providing business funding from $10,000-$250,000 with same-day access to capital and competitive rates. Known for fast application with limited documentation.

California-based fintech that enables companies and marketplaces to manage independent contractor workforces and streamline payments to 200+ countries. Raised $24.4M equity and $200M debt from Jefferies. Advances earned amounts to freelancers ahead of pay cycles. Acquired by LSQ.

New York-based MCA company established in 2014 providing working capital to small and medium businesses nationwide. Offers up to $500K in funding approved within three days. Has raised $106M in total funding.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

Florida-based (Davie, FL) small business funding company offering equipment financing, working capital, cash advances, start-up financing, lines of credit, SBA loans, factoring, and real estate investment loans from $4K to $2M with quick 2-day processing.
Delaware-registered company with a Brazilian domain (rapidoo.com.br), likely a Brazil-focused fintech. Limited public information available about US operations.
New York-based (Hauppauge, Long Island) MCA company helping business owners acquire same-day working capital through merchant cash advances.
Florida-based commercial capital provider. Limited public information available about specific lending products.
Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

New York-based merchant cash advance provider offering quick and easy alternative financial solutions for small businesses with funding as fast as 24 hours. Works with merchants across various credit ranges.

Colorado Springs-based small business lender offering equipment financing, working capital, commercial financing, vendor financing, and equipment leasing nationwide. Provides funding in as little as 24 hours with no credit minimums to apply.

Norcross, GA-based small business loan provider offering revenue-based loans, term loans, business lines of credit, invoice factoring, SBA loans, cash advances, and equipment financing. Takes a holistic approach to lending beyond credit history.
Small business funding company offering merchant cash advances. Limited public information available.

Brooklyn, NY-based online MCA platform founded in 2016, providing funding solutions for small businesses needing cash to grow. Offers same-day deposits for businesses with 4+ months incorporated and $5,000+ monthly deposits.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.

New York-based fintech providing security deposit financing and flexible credit lines to help freelancers and entrepreneurs access coworking office spaces. Raised $6.3M total, graduated from Barclays Techstars accelerator in 2017. R&D center in Tel Aviv.
South Carolina-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
California-based small business loan provider offering $5,000 to $500,000 with competitive rates, quick approval, and automated ACH repayment on daily, weekly, or monthly schedules.
California-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.
Washington-based company. Limited public information available about their role in small business lending.
Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

New Jersey-based short-term financing lender offering small business and commercial lending with approval based on cash flow rather than collateral. Also offers commercial property financing. Funds within 24-72 hours for businesses with 3+ months history and $4,000+ monthly sales.
Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.
California-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.

California-based (Sherman Oaks) specialized working capital lender for digital media and ad tech companies, formerly known as Fast Pay Partners, now subsidiary of SLR Business Credit. Offers factoring and asset-based loans up to $250M for ad tech companies, publishers, ad networks, and digital platforms.

North Miami Beach, FL-based MCA provider specializing in merchant cash advances for Florida businesses. Offers customized financing solutions with local expertise, transparent terms, and funding within 24-48 hours.

McAllen, TX-based small business funding broker offering term loans, working capital advances, equipment leasing, SBA loans, factoring, and lines of credit from $5K-$5M. Nationwide network of lenders with same-day funding available.

Connecticut-based division of Stearns Bank (a $3.2B national financial institution) offering SBA 7(a) loans up to $5M, equipment financing, working capital loans, and merchant cash advances. One of the nation's top equipment lenders and tech-powered loan marketplaces.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.
Brooklyn, NY-based small business loan and MCA provider. BBB-listed since 2018, offers merchant cash advances and alternative business financing. Located at 1221 McDonald Ave, Brooklyn.

New York-based alternative lending firm investing in merchant cash advances, invoice factoring, and ACH factoring. Also provides syndication management for high-net-worth individuals interested in B2B investing.
New Jersey-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

Richardson, TX-based commercial lending company established in 2019 supporting small businesses with growth capital, revolving credit lines, equipment financing, and SBA loans. Approval and funding in 24-72 hours.
Kansas-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.

California-based nonprofit (501(c)(3)) providing microloans with NO interest, NO fees, and NO penalties. Founded in 2020, registered in California. Aims to make microfinance radically different and kinder. Not a traditional MCA or commercial lender.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

California-based (Newport Beach) lender founded in 2008, specializing in residual and commission-based lending to merchant services ISOs, MSPs, VARs, and insurance brokers. Loans from $100K-$5M with 12-48 month terms. Over $250M funded to 150+ borrowers. Rebranded as SG Credit Partners to expand into broader lower middle market lending.
Small business funding company. Limited public information available.

Los Angeles, CA-based small business lender founded in 2023 offering lines of credit, small business loans (up to $1M unsecured), equipment financing, invoice factoring, and revenue-based financing. 80%+ approval rate with funding in 24 hours.

California-based small business lender offering loans up to $5M with approval in minutes and funding in 48 hours. Products include merchant cash advances, short-term loans, and term loans with educational resources for small business borrowers.

Kansas-based business funding company specializing in invoice factoring services with 20+ years of experience. Helps small and middle-market companies access working capital through strategic investment funding and private equity solutions.

New York-based direct MCA funder launched in 2013, focusing on building and supporting ISO relationships. Specializes in merchant cash advances with technology-driven underwriting based on revenue trends and cash flow rather than strict credit requirements.

Brooklyn, NY-based direct lending firm offering merchant cash advances ($10K-$1M), small business loans, collateral loans, business lines of credit, and invoice factoring. Funds in 24-48 hours and serves businesses in all 50 states including women-owned, minority-owned, and veteran-owned.

Alabama-based MCA provider with offices in Texas, New York, Alabama, and Canada. Offers bilingual (English-Vietnamese) support and merchant cash advances based on average revenue of last 3 months with daily/weekly repayment.

New York-based MCA provider offering merchant cash advances, asset-based loans, franchise financing, startup funding, and real estate lending. Funding available within 24 hours for businesses with $5,000+ monthly revenue.

Piscataway, NJ-based MCA company (dba Total Merchant Resources) founded in 2008. ISO-level funding organization offering merchant cash advances from $5K-$1M with customizable daily/weekly repayment schedules. Typically funds within 24-48 hours.

Dallas, TX-based purchase order and alternative inventory finance company founded in 2017. Provides $50K-$15M in finished goods, production, government contract, and reseller financing to SMBs in the US, Canada, and UK. 40+ years of combined leadership expertise.

Baltimore, MD-based non-bank online trade finance platform that brings together key components of trade finance into a single digital process. Provides pre-approved revolving facilities for buyers to finance trade with multiple suppliers, both cross-border and domestic.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Wisconsin-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.
Small business funding company. Limited public information available.
Minnesota-based small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.

New York-based (Farmingville, NY) financial services company with 20+ years in operation, offering small business loans and merchant cash advances from $2,000 to $2,000,000 with funding in as little as 3 business days.

New York-based business lending marketplace since 2011, connecting businesses with 75+ lenders for business lines of credit, term loans, merchant cash advances, SBA loans, and working capital. Over 1,500 five-star reviews. MCAs up to $1M available.

California-based residential mortgage lender (not small business/MCA). Established nearly 40 years ago, now part of New Home Co. family. Licensed in multiple states for residential mortgage lending. Headquarters in Greenwood Village, CO.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

New Jersey-based MCA lender specializing in C-D paper threshold. Does not run credit, prioritizes funding based on payment history, revenue streams, and daily ending balances. Same-day funding available.

Florida-based (Sweetwater/Miami) revenue-based financing provider founded in 2018, offering working capital up to $1M for small businesses with funding as fast as 60 minutes. Note: FTC has filed a lawsuit alleging predatory lending practices.

Texas-based digital-first equipment finance platform launched by TransPecos Banks. Offers incredibly fast and flexible small business equipment financing from $1,000 to $150,000, combining consumer lending simplicity with commercial equipment financing.

New York-based (Melville/Cedarhurst) alternative funding company specializing in revenue-based financing and merchant cash advances. Funded $75M+ to small businesses in first year. Over 15,000 clients served with 25+ years experience in sub-prime financing. Same-day funding up to $1M.

New York-based (Hauppauge, NY) fintech providing instant funding solutions for small businesses by leveraging commercial check deposits. Proprietary check decisioning model has enabled $1.2B worth of checks funded at 99.97% success rate, up to $25K per check within minutes.

Fort Lauderdale, FL-based alternative lender offering merchant cash advances, revenue-based financing, AR factoring, equipment financing, lines of credit, SBA loans, and payroll solutions. No credit checks or collateral required with funding within 24 hours.

New York-based (48 Wall St) MCA company operating since 2014 under parent entity Emerald Group Holdings, LLC. Provides working capital ($10K-$400K) for small to medium businesses with daily/weekly debits, early payoff discounts, and 24/7 ISO relations service.
Arizona-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available about specific MCA or lending products.
Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

Northbrook, IL-based (Chicago area) merchant cash advance and working capital lender providing small businesses with non-bank cash funding. Serves businesses in construction, healthcare, retail, restaurants, and transportation nationwide. Approximately $7.8M revenue.
Small business funding company. Limited public information available.
Connecticut-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

Los Angeles, CA-based MCA provider offering merchant cash advances, merchant financing, online financing, restaurant financing, reverse consolidation, and unsecured business financing. Funds within 24-72 hours with only 4 bank statements and signed application required.

Michigan-based company specializing in MCA consolidation and restructuring for small businesses. Provides non-credit-based working capital solutions, focusing on debt schedule and profit/loss margins rather than credit scores. Also offers business loan alternatives to MCAs.
New York-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.
Nevada-based small business working capital provider. Limited public information available about specific lending products.
Small business lending company. Limited public information available.
Florida-based (Miami area) MCA provider offering merchant cash advances for small businesses with working capital and a 97% approval rating. Funds clients in as little as 24 hours.
Likely a duplicate entry of Wynwood Capital (id 1450). Florida-based MCA provider offering merchant cash advances with fast funding and high approval rates.

Wyoming's leading SBA 504 loan provider with 40+ years of service. Offers SBA 504 loans (up to $3M), direct loans (up to $250K) for equipment, land, building purchases, and working capital. Strengthens communities by providing low-interest financing to small businesses.

New Jersey-based boutique finance company backed by private investors offering MCA, lines of credit, SBA loans, disaster loans, equipment loans, hard money loans, and merchant funding for businesses of all sizes throughout the US.

California-based (Costa Mesa/Huntington Beach) direct lender since 2004, formerly Merchant Capital Source. Offers term loans, business cash advances, and lines of credit from $10K-$250K with 3-12 month terms. CA licensed lender with $300M+ funded to 10,000+ businesses. 70% repeat customer rate.
Florida-based small business funding company. Limited public information available.

Florida-based MCA provider offering merchant cash advances up to $100K based on debit and credit card sales. Provides alternative business funding for companies that may not qualify for traditional loans.

Staten Island, NY-based MCA provider offering merchant cash advances and consolidation programs up to $200K (240 days) and regular MCAs up to $25K (80 days). Partners with CFG Merchant Solutions as primary capital partner since 2016.

Boynton Beach, FL-based MCA company (est. 2018) operating under multiple DBAs: BHB Funding, First Street Funding, CRM Funding, Orange Funding, and PrimeCommercial. Provides merchant cash advances to small businesses.
New York-based MCA company offering merchant cash advances to small businesses. Limited detailed public information available about specific products and terms.
Colorado-based MCA company operating as Cashfund (dba of CFS CAP, LLC). Offers small business loans with funding up to $500K available in as little as 24 hours through merchant cash advances.

San Diego, CA-based lender with 20+ years experience providing small business loans, business lines of credit ($25K-$500K), equipment financing, and revenue-based financing. Licensed in all 50 states. Approvals in 4 hours, funding within 24 hours.

New York-based fintech company providing revenue-based financing with funding from $10K-$3M. Delivers swift financial solutions within 24 hours, serving businesses nationwide. Offers snap funding with no stipulations and terms up to 10 months.
New York-based small business lending company. Limited public information available about specific products and services.

West Palm Beach, FL-based working capital and factoring company providing hassle-free financing to small business owners. Offers MCA and working capital funding up to $2M with approval within 48 hours, regardless of credit score.

Irvine, CA-based MCA provider offering customized financing solutions up to $500K with minimal documentation and funding in 24 hours. Serves businesses across all industries including cash advance collection, mortgage, and various other sectors.

New York-based MCA provider with offices in Connecticut, Florida, and New York. Offers merchant cash advances as alternative funding solutions for small businesses with fast and transparent financing options.
California-based financial services company (dba EMC Financial) offering merchant cash advances and alternative business financing. Limited detailed public information available.
Duplicate entry of The Smarter Merchant (see id 1416). New York-based direct MCA funder launched in 2013, focusing on ISO relationships and technology-driven underwriting for merchant cash advances.
New York-based MCA company (Essentia Holdings, LLC dba Essentia Funding) providing merchant cash advances and revenue-based financing to small businesses.

Florida-based small business financial services company offering term loans, asset-based loans, accounts receivable financing, credit counsel, and merchant cash advances. Provides same-day funding during normal business banking hours.
